00033 #include <cstring>

00037 
00038 // Class for reading a cel file without loading the whole thing into RAM at once.
00039 class CelFileStreamReader
00040 {
00041   public:
00042     CelFileStreamReader(const std::string &filename);
00043 
00044     // The copied or assigned-to object starts its iteration at the beginning.
00045     CelFileStreamReader(const CelFileStreamReader& other);
00046     CelFileStreamReader& operator=(const CelFileStreamReader &other);
00047     
00048     ~CelFileStreamReader();
00049 
00050     
00051   CONSTHACK affxcel::CCELFileHeaderData &getHeader() CONSTHACK;
00052     
00053 
00054     // Each of the methods below advances to the next element in the cel file
00055     // and returns the requested value.
00056     // If you want to get more than one attribute from a single element, you
00057     // must use getNextEntry, and then pick the attributes you want from the
00058     // struct that gets filled out.
00059     float getNextIntensity();
00060     float getNextStdv();
00061     short getNextPixels();
00062     void getNextEntry(affxcel::CELFileEntryType *val);
00063 
00064     // Returns the index of the next element to be read from the cel file.
00065   size_t getNextIndex();
00066 
00067     static size_t determineHeaderSize(const std::string &filename);
00068 
00069   private:
00070     void startIterating();
00071   affxcel::CELFileEntryType getNextEntryUnswapped();
00072     
00073   private:
00074     std::string m_filename;
00075     affxcel::CCELFileHeaderData m_header;
00076     size_t m_nextIndex;
00077     std::ifstream m_instream;
00078 };
